subject: Don't have time to visit local drug store
body:
Dear valued member.
Do you want to buy high quality products at lower price? Save on your drugs with MyCanadianPharmacy. 
There is no need to purchase expensive American drugs. Buy Canadian products manufactured according to the same strict medical standards followed in the United States.
Check it out nowhttp://happencaught.hk
Secure online ordering process serves to guarantee high level of confidentiality.
Yours faithfully,Aida Benavides
